thread.title: Digital Marketing Company Spartan Digital Re-branded as Webopty
thread.title_full: Digital Marketing Company Spartan Digital Re-branded as Webopty - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Digital Marketing Company Spartan Digital Re-branded as Webopty
text:
Formally Spartan Digital, Webopty announces the launch of a new website to celebrate its name change.
 TORONTO, ON, September 04, Spartan Digital officially re-branded and changed its name to Webopty. The company, which provides online lead generation services in the Toronto area, has a fresh new logo and has launched a sleek new website in celebration. With Webopty's help, businesses can experience a stronger online presence, and increased leads.
"Our goal is simple-to generate more revenue for our clients," said Neil Perulli, founder of Webopty. "At Webopty, we focus on increasing leads, not just how many people click a link."
Webopty plans to continue the success it has already established under its original name by providing the same quality products. Clients will receive unique professional services, which assist in finding what makes their company stand out. Together, the client and marketing company work to create solutions, which fit within the specified budget. Reports are given regularly, showing how the solution is working, and the team at Webopty works to educate businesses so that they can be an active part of their own digital marketing success. By using up-to-date, risk-free tactics to optimize leads and sales, the SEO company focuses on long-term success.
Webopty gives digital marketing advice regularly on its blog. Interested persons or businesses may sign up for a free SEO site audit on Webopty's new website at http://www.webopty.com/ .
Webopty, formally Spartan Digital, has been offering businesses of all sizes holistic digital marketing solutions since 2014. In August of 2015, the company changed names and re-branded with a new website while continuing to provide elite services to its customers. Services available include custom web design, SEO, social media marketing, PPC, content management, conversion rate optimization, and more. Businesses that want more information can communicate with Webopty through the contact page at http://www.webopty.com/contact/ or by mail at 140 Yonge St. Suite 300, Toronto Ontario M5C 1X6
